titles.title: A resolution designating the week of February 4 through February 8, 2008, as "National School Counseling Week".
A resolution designating the week of February 4 through February 8, 2008, as "National School Counseling Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates the week of February 4 through February 8, 2008, as National School Counseling Week.
